 boomed

one

> Twin sonic=
 missiles streak towards Hydras' shuttle, even as a high

can be heard over the radio, effectively squelching

ceptor and Darkhawk (might cover Scorpi, Myrmidon and Jhiaxus as

shriek))

dimus.

to 
> line up another shot. Using his superior speed over Rodimus he 
> man=
euvered to dodge the weapons fire, but clearly underestimated 
his 
> foe! =
The first shot missed - as it was designed to do, the bright 
> lights dist=
racting and partially blinding him! The blindness allows 
> the second one =
to hit him in the under plating knocking him to the 
> side as he began to =
fall from the air. 
> 
> In a desperate maneuver Cyclonus shifted to his ro=
bot form as he 
> crashed on the ground, his legs barely getting beneath hi=
m before 
he 
> hits absorbing the impact.

> A lesser robot would have =
taken severe damage, and as it is 
Cyclonus' 
> armor is dented from his un=
expected landing, but Cyclonus quickly 
> stands his face cool and calm as =
he observed his opponent. 
> 
> "It would seem your recent um modifications=
 have not dulled your 
> edge." Cyclonus' voice echoed across to Rodimus, "=
Good!"

=
Rodimus
